content: --नेत्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (said of a lady) having eyes with beautiful (or long) outer corners; यदियं पुनरप्यपांगनेत्रा परिवृत्तार्धमुखी मयाद्य दृष्टा <ls>V. 1. 17</ls> (a better interpretation would however be ‘with the eyes turned towards the corners’ अपांगयोः प्रेरिते नेत्रे यया {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} casting side-long looks).
